definition: one week/all the way around/a whole cycle
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
to make a circuit/to circle/circle/circumference/lap/cycle/complete/all/all over/thorough/to help financially

sentences.english: This week is for mourning. Tears have a therapeutic power.
sentences.chinese: 这是哀痛的一周，泪水可以治疗悲伤。

sentences.english: But external hemorrhoids usually resolve in a week or so.
sentences.chinese: 一般而言，外痔引起的不适可在一周左右解除。

sentences.english: He was laid up for a week by an intestinal bug.
sentences.chinese: 他因为肠道感染细菌休息了一周。

sentences.english: There's been a big hubbub this past week about antibiotics.
sentences.chinese: 在过去的一周，进行了一场关于抗生素的嘈杂的讨论。

sentences.english: He had seen no daily paper all week, and, strangely to him, felt no desire to see one.
sentences.chinese: 他已经一周没看报，令他奇怪的是，也并不想看。

sentences.english: Galanz just about a week ago and the National US-held section of microwave ovens .
sentences.chinese: 格兰仕大约一周前刚刚与国美合作举行微波炉节。

sentences.english: The main purpose of the notebook is to help you prepare a weekly study schedule.
sentences.chinese: 这个笔记本的主要用途是帮你准备一周学习计划。

sentences.english: I started taking pulsatilla and within a week, my acne was soo much better!
sentences.chinese: 我开始尝试这个产品，一周内，我的痘痘改善了很多。

sentences.english: Your chart is looking really good this week & causing the attention of others to be riveted directly upon you…
sentences.chinese: 这周你的命盘看起来非常不错，是广受关注的一周。

sentences.english: The X-ray shows a fractured ankle.
sentences.chinese: 一周之后再来，我给你拆线。

sentences.english: The findings contradict statements made by Halliburton in the weeks following the accident.
sentences.chinese: 该发现反驳了哈里伯顿在事故发生后一周的说法。

sentences.english: I wish you a succes in your business transaction .
sentences.chinese: 新的一周开开始，大家生意兴隆。

sentences.english: This is CS50, Friday of Week 0.
sentences.chinese: 本课程是CS50，第一周周五的课。

sentences.english: Practical training report should be submitted within one week after completion of training instructor approval.
sentences.chinese: 实训报告应在实训完成后一周内交实训指导教师批阅。

sentences.english: He lists his engagements for the week.
sentences.chinese: 他把一周要做的事列成表。

sentences.english: It's constant reminder, twice a week.
sentences.chinese: 经常性的提醒，一周两次。

definition: to make a circuit/to circle/circle/circumference/lap/cycle/complete/all/all over/thorough/to help financially
